# Dumb Contracts Documentation
# For AI Agents and LLMs
# https://github.com/Th0rgal/dumbcontracts

> Dumb Contracts explores auditable smart contract specs with Lean proofs compiled toward Yul/EVM.
> The goal is simple, human-auditable rules and machine-checked implementations.

## How to Access Documentation

All docs are available as raw markdown:

1. **Automatic**: If your User-Agent is a known LLM (ChatGPT, GPTBot, PerplexityBot, ClaudeBot, etc.), you automatically get raw markdown
2. **Add .md extension**: `/status.md` returns raw markdown
3. **Accept header**: `Accept: text/markdown`
4. **Query param**: `/status?format=md`
5. **API directly**: `/api/docs/status`

Known LLM User-Agents that get markdown automatically:
ChatGPT-User, GPTBot, Claude-Web, ClaudeBot, PerplexityBot, Applebot, cohere-ai, anthropic-ai, Google-Extended, CCBot

## Documentation Index

### Overview
- /index.md - Project overview and quick start
- /status.md - Current focus and progress
- /roadmap.md - Milestones and next steps

### Research
- /formal-approach.md - Lean specs + proofs, compiled toward Yul/EVM
- /simplification.md - Keep the repo small and auditable
- /landscape.md - External tooling landscape
- /research-log.md - Timestamped change history

### Special Endpoints
- /api/docs/_index - JSON index of all documents
- /api/docs/_all - All documentation concatenated (for full context loading)

## Source

- Repository: https://github.com/Th0rgal/dumbcontracts
